snippet: Checking in on the second season of "Portlandia" on IFC.
abstract: Checking in on the second season of "Portlandia" on IFC.
lead_paragraph: The second season of Carrie Brownstein and Fred Armisen's rigorously lo-fi comedy "Portlandia" arrives on IFC on Friday night riding a relentless wave of hype. Not many shows this small-bore -- six half-hour episodes in the first season, expanded to 10 for Season 2 -- get this kind of attention, with late-night guest spots, a red-carpet New York premiere (for the second season!) and a tour, which comes to Brooklyn and Manhattan on Jan. 20 and 21.
